Room Features

The City View Twin One Bedroom Suites offer quintessential Manhattan charm with stunning views and feature four-fixture bathrooms. These 800 square foot suites are situated on floors 5 to 20.

Bed & Bath Experience

This one-bedroom suite offers captivating views of New York City’s skyline. The suite offers an entry way with double door closet, a well-appointed living room featuring a comfortable sofa and coffee table overlooking the 40” wall mounted TV and console with minibar. There are 2 side chairs and side table along at the far side of the living room. An executive writing desk and chair completes the room.

The comfortable bedroom features twin beds, an armchair with side table on the far side of the room. The twin bed set up has a nightstand between both beds with Bose Wave studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock. The four fixture Turkish marble-clad bathroom features a glass enclosed shower, soaking tub with oversized showerheads, plush bathrobes, towels and luxurious Etro bath amenities.
